thread.title: Natural-Gas Prices Rise as Prospect of Cooler Weather Gains Traction
thread.title_full: Natural-Gas Prices Rise as Prospect of Cooler Weather Gains Traction - WSJ

author: Alison Sider
title: Natural-Gas Prices Rise as Prospect of Cooler Weather Gains Traction

organizations.name: prospect of cooler weather gains traction

text:
Natural-gas prices rose Friday amid forecasts of approaching cooler weather that could bring more demand.
Natural-gas prices rose 14 cents, or 5.18%, to settle at $2.843 a million British thermal units on the New York Mercantile Exchange. Natural gas futures snapped a two week losing streak, posting the largest weekly gain since early October....
